Class DateConfiguration

java.lang.Object
CAMs.DateConfiguration
public class DateConfiguration extends Object
Provides utility methods for date-related operations and validations.

  • Method Details

    • hasDateClash

      public static boolean hasDateClash(CAMs.Camp newCamp, CAMs.Student student)
      Checks if there is a date clash between a new camp and a student's registered camps.
      Parameters:
      newCamp - The new camp to be checked for date clash.
      student - The student for whom the date clash is checked.
      Returns:
      true if there is a date clash, false otherwise.

    • checkCorrectDate

      public static boolean checkCorrectDate(String startDate, String endDate)
      Checks if the given start and end dates are in the correct order.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date to be checked.
      endDate - The end date to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the dates are in the correct order, false otherwise.

    • doDatesOverlap

      public static boolean doDatesOverlap(Date start1, Date end1, Date start2, Date end2)
      Checks if two date ranges overlap.
      Parameters:
      start1 - The start date of the first date range.
      end1 - The end date of the first date range.
      start2 - The start date of the second date range.
      end2 - The end date of the second date range.
      Returns:
      true if the date ranges overlap, false otherwise.
